products.title: Gleneagles Stripe Granite Roman Blind
products.description: Gleneagles feature several bold stripes combining darker blues and blacks with neutral creams and whites. Their granite striped gleneagles fabric features a navy blue and black blend striped paired with cream and red stripes. The striking red and cream stripes has blue thread interwoven into the colour, meaning a softer blend of colours. Product id: db-rom0979 fabric colour: granite material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.description: Gleneagles feature several bold stripes combining darker blues and blacks with neutral creams and whites. The soft cream and white stripes has brown/grey interwoven into the colour, meaning a softer blend of colours. products.title: Ascot Stripe Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Do you have a tricky window that needs precisely the right material? Then look no further. The ascot striped roman blind in fashionable grey is ideal. Woven in a blend of matte stripes and silky yarns, youll not only be investing in a roman blind in a fabric which falls flawlessly, youre also insulating your home against winter chills and evening drafts. Product id: db-rom1091 fabric colour: grey material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Candy Stripe Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Luxurious softness meets sharp chic in this candy stripe charcoal roman blind. The crisp, clean lines of the tonal stripes are the perfect geometric touch for a modern pad, the black and white mingling in style with greys and neutrals. The fabric on the other hand is luxurious softness meets sharp chic in this candy stripe charcoal roman blind.

products.description: This earthy palette is perfect for adding some pattern to your home. products.title: Guarda Stripe, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: The subtle latte brown and dove grey colour palette of the guarda stripe in grey is versatile enough to work in most dcor schemes, whilst the off-white background and occasional jet black stripe offset the colours perfectly. Use the grey to create a strong, moody style in a den or study. Embrace the colour scheme and opt for grey walls and black and white accessories, using the odd light wood to bring out the unusual tan tone in the blind.
